properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:40PM MST until January 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions. Total
snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with localized higher
amounts near Buffalo Pass, are expected.

* WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Buffalo Pass.

* WHEN...Midnight until midnight Tuesday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times.

Snow forecast from midnight Tonight to midnight Tuesday night:

Buffalo Pass  3 to 5  inches          Ganado  0 to 1  inches
Window Rock  0 to 1  inches
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.
The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST TUESDAY NIGHT
